Description.Name: Odin Scout Tank
Description.Details: The Odin Scout Tank is a quick combat vehicle that is one of the finest reconnaissance units in any Clan's touman. Only twenty tons, the wheeled vehicle relies upon its 130 km/h top speed to stay out of enemy fire, as its one and a half ton of Ferro-Fibrous armor is woefully insufficient to stand up to anything more substantial than small arms fire. Its main reason for existence is the Active Probe, which can detect hidden units out to one hundred fifty meters. Though the Odin is supposed to stay out of combat, it is capable of defending itself if necessary. Its turret mounts a pair of  Medium Pulse Lasers and a  Streak SRM-2 launcher. An ER Small Laser  is mounted on the front of the tank. Wheeled: Fast in open ground, slow in rough terrain. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 8/12 Hex: 240/360 Meters.
